Installation
============

From PyPI
---------

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install pyngb

From Source
-----------

.. code-block:: bash

   git clone https://github.com/GraysonBellamy/pyngb.git
   cd pyngb
   pip install -e .

Requirements
------------

* Python 3.9+
* polars >= 1.0.0
* pyarrow >= 10.0.0

Optional Dependencies
---------------------

For development:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install pyngb[dev]
